func:
var sql = "CREATE TABLE ";
var tname = "sensordata";
var cols = " (TIMESTAMP BIGINT NOT NULL, " +
	"date VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, " +
    "time VARCHAR(12) NOT NULL, " +
    "name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, " +
    "ignStatus VARCHAR(4), " +
    "battStatus FLOAT, " +
    "engineTemp FLOAT, " +
    "engineOil FLOAT, " +
    "fuelLevel FLOAT, " +
    "engineSpeed FLOAT, " +
    "hydraulicPr FLOAT, " +
    "liftedLoad FLOAT, " +
    "PRIMARY KEY(TIMESTAMP, name) " +
    ");"
msg.topic = sql + tname + cols;
return msg;
